pageTextData.title: Agua Montana
pageTextData.subTitle: Spain's Leading Mountain Water
pageTextData.description: Brough to you by Coca Cola, Agua Montana is Spain's leading mountain water brand, now with brand new fruity flavours in your favourite can form.

pageTextData.x3dCreationMethod: This X3D model of the Agua Montana Can has been created in 3ds Max, exported to VRML97 and converted, using the instantreality transcoders, to X3D for display online.

pageTextData.galleryDescription: These 3D images of an Agua Montana, Agua Limon and Agua Fresa Cans have been rendered in 3ds max.

pageTextData.CameraSubtitle: These buttons select a range of X3D model viewpoints
